name: Create Data Compliance Record
description: Creates and link a data compliance record and corresponding task to the parent incident

steps.name: Add Comment to Incident
steps.description: Add a comment stating that the Data Compliance Record is already created for the Incident.

resource.content: Data Compliance Record #{{vars.steps.Find_Correlated_Compliance_Record[0].dataCompliances[0].id}} and corresponding Task #{{vars.steps.Find_Correlated_Compliance_Record[0].tasks[0].id}} has already been created.

message.content: Initiating PHI(Protected Health Information) Breach Risk Assessment.

Thanks for your input.
 
GDPR Compliance Record #{{vars.steps.Create_GDPR_Data_Compliance_Record.id}} and corresponding Task #{{vars.steps.Create_Task_GDPR_Assessment.id}} has been created.

resource.name: Perform GDPR Assessment
resource.description: {% if vars.testModeStatus %}Test Mode ON{% endif %} As per GDPR guidelines provided in [*Article - 33*](https://gdpr-info.eu/art-33-gdpr/), in the event of a personal data breach, it is mandatory to notify Data Protection Authority within 72 hours of the breach happening. Based on your information, the following GDPR Data Compliance record has been created.  GDPR Compliance Record #{{vars.steps.Create_GDPR_Data_Compliance_Record.id}} Perform the tasks provided in the record and complete the GDPR Assessment

message.content:
Thanks for your input.
 
HIPAA Compliance Record #{{vars.steps.Create_HIPAA_Data_Compliance_Record.id}} and corresponding Task #{{vars.steps.Create_Task_HIPAA_Assessment.id}} has been created.

resource.name: Perform HIPAA Assessment
resource.description: {% if vars.testModeStatus %}Test Mode ON{% endif %} As per HIPAA guidelines provided in [*Breach Notification Rule*](https://www.hhs.gov/hipaa/for-professionals/breach-notification/index.html), in event of a breach of unsecured PHI/ePHI, it is mandatory to notify individuals, the relevant federal agency, and in some cases local media. Based on your information, the following HIPAA Data Compliance record has been created. HIPAA Assessment Record #{{vars.steps.Create_HIPAA_Data_Compliance_Record.id}} Perform the tasks provided in the record and complete the HIPAA Assessment

step_variables.testModeStatus: {% if vars.testMode %}true{% elif (not vars.testMode) and (vars.testEmail | length > 0 and vars.testEmail != 'NA') %}true{% elif (not vars.testMode) and (vars.testEmail | length == 0 or vars.testEmail == 'NA') %}false{% endif %}

schema.title: Submit Data Breach Information

inputVariables.name: breachOccurrenceDate
inputVariables.label: Breach Occurrence Date
inputVariables.title: Date/Time Field
inputVariables.tooltip: Date and time when the data breach incident took place

inputVariables.name: breachDetectionDate
inputVariables.label: Breach Detection Date
inputVariables.title: Date/Time Field
inputVariables.tooltip: Date and time when the data breach incident detected

inputVariables.name: wasTheDataEncrypted
inputVariables.label: Was the Data Encrypted?
inputVariables.title: Picklist
inputVariables.tooltip: Choose Yes - If breached data was encrypted

inputVariables.name: wasTheExposureResolved
inputVariables.label: Was the Exposure Resolved?
inputVariables.title: Picklist
inputVariables.tooltip: Choose Yes - If the data breach exposure is now resolved

inputVariables.name: isHarmRiskOrMisuseForeseeable
inputVariables.label: Is Data Misuse or Disclosure Foreseeable?
inputVariables.title: Picklist
inputVariables.tooltip: Choose Yes - If the data breach risks the rights and freedoms of data subjects

inputVariables.name: whatWasTheDataFormat
inputVariables.label: What was the Data Format?
inputVariables.tooltip: Such as Physical or Digital Documents, Multimedia, Spreadsheets etc

inputVariables.name: whatWasTheDataSource
inputVariables.label: What was the Data Source?
inputVariables.tooltip: Such as Databases, Cloud, Third-party Site etc.

inputVariables.name: briefDescriptionOfTheBreach
inputVariables.label: Brief Description of the Breach
inputVariables.title: Text Area
inputVariables.tooltip: Provide a concise summary of the breach incident, outlining key details and impacts.

inputVariables.name: wasThePHIEncrypted
inputVariables.label: Was the PHI/ePHI Encrypted?
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List
inputVariables.tooltip: Choose Yes - If breached Protected Health Information (PHI) was encrypted

inputVariables.name: isPHIMisuseOrDisclosureForeseeable
inputVariables.label: Is PHI Misuse or Disclosure Foreseeable?
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List
inputVariables.tooltip: Choose Yes - If the data breach risks the further exposure or misuse of PHI impermissibly

inputVariables.name: wasThePHIAccessedImpermissibly
inputVariables.label: Was the PHI/ePHI Accessed Impermissibly?
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List
inputVariables.tooltip: Choose Yes - If PHI or ePHI was accessed without proper authorization or permission in a breach.

inputVariables.name: whoAccessedPHIEPHIWithoutPermission
inputVariables.label: Who Accessed PHI/ePHI Without Permission? (If Known)
inputVariables.title: Text Area
inputVariables.tooltip: If available, provide the identity of the individual or entity who accessed the PHI/ePHI without proper permission or authorization.

response_mapping.customSuccessMessage: Data breach details have been collected successfully.

steps.name: Get Regulatory Body Names
steps.description: This step gets a list of compliance SPs, the list will be provided as input to the preceding step "Get Data Breach Details"

routes.name: Create GDPR Data Compliance Record -> Create Task GDPR Assessment
Create HIPAA Data Compliance Record -> Create Task HIPAA Assessment
Find Correlated Compliance Record -> Is Correlated Complaiance Record Found
Get Data Breach Details -> Regulatory Body
routes.label: Submit

routes.name: Get Regulatory Body Names -> Find Correlated Compliance Record
Is Correlated Complaiance Record Found -> Add Comment to Incident
Is Correlated Complaiance Record Found -> Get Data Breach Details
Regulatory Body -> Create GDPR Data Compliance Record
routes.label: GDPR

routes.name: Regulatory Body -> Create HIPAA Data Compliance Record
routes.label: HIPAA
